Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: EB 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, State, 11th, Wabash & Roosevelt, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, State, 11th, Wabash & Roosevelt, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ashland/Ravenswood
ShortDescription: NB 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Montrose, Ravenswood/Lawrence & Ashland, due to a festival near Ashland/Ravenswood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Montrose, Ravenswood/Lawrence & Ashland, due to a festival near Ashland/Ravenswood.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove, #106 East 103rd, #111 111th/King Drive,  #111A Pullman Shuttle and #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at Cottage Grove/107th.
ShortDescription: 4 Cott, 106 E 103rd, 111 111th/King, 111A Pullman Shutt & 115 Pullman buses rtd via Cottage Grv, 100th, King & 107th due to police activity nr Cottage Gr/107th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#4 Cottage Grove, #106 East 103rd, #111 111th/King Drive, #111A Pullman Shuttle and #115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cottage Grove, 100th, King Drive & 107th due to police activity near Cottage Grove/107th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute near 63rd/King Drive (Green Line)
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses rrtd EB via 63rd, Indiana, 61st, King Dr & 63rd: WB via 3rd, King Dr, 61st, Indiana, 60th, Michigan & 63rd due to blockage nr 63rd/King Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to  street blockage near 63rd/King Drive (Green Line).

  • Eastbound buses will operate via 63rd, Indiana, 61st, King Drive, then resume their normal route on 63rd.
  • Westbound buses will operate via 63rd, King Drive, 61st, Indiana, 60th, Michigan, then resume their normal route on 63rd.

Allow extra travel time.
